firstNightReminder: Give them the number of pairs
name: The Star
ability: You start knowing which outsiders are in play. [+1/-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If they are dead wake them up to pick a player
name: Death
ability: When you die at night, pick another dead player to resurrect.

firstNightReminder: Wake them, let them choose and give them the number
otherNightReminder: Wake them, let them choose and give them the number
name: Wheel of Fortune
ability: Each night, Chose any number of players, learn how many players you picked are townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: Let them choose a dead player, but not fish for one
name: The Moon
ability: Each night*, pick a dead player, learn their Character.

otherNightReminder: Wake them last and they learn who picked who
name: The Magician
ability: Each night, pick three players, learn who they picked, order is arbitrary.

name: The Lovers
ability: You start knowing how many Outsider/Evil pairs there are.[+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: They Gain the ability they so do desire and use it if they can
name: The Chariot
ability: Once per game*, at night you may gain the ability of a dead player, if you pick an evil player, you become drunk.

otherNightReminder: Let them pick then, tell demon of thier pick and wake them up right after ddemon kills if the demon doesn't choose the same.
name: Judged
ability: Each night*, choose a player the demon learns this, If the Demon doesn’t kill them, you learn a neighbor of an evil player.

firstNightReminder: Show them the character that they are protected.
name: Justice
ability: You start knowing a good character, the first time they would die, you die instead.

name: The High Priestess
ability: Each night, choose a character, learn if that character is in play. (If they are in play you 'pick' them.

firstNightReminder: Shugenja, but you pick where to start from.
name: The Hierophant
ability: First night, choose a player, learn what direction the closest Evil player is to them

name: The Hermit
ability: Each day you may visit the storyteller, choose a player, learn something about them.

name: The Tower
ability: The first time you die at night, instead your good neighbors die, instead

firstNightReminder: Wake someone up and tell them this character is in play
name: The Devil
ability: You think you are a townsfolk character. Good can’t win as long as you are alive, even if you are Poisoned/Drunk. A townsfolk knows you are in play.

name: The Ace
ability: If you are picked at night by a townsfolk, one of your neighbors is chosen instead, even when dead. An extra The Ace is evil and/or drunk. [+0/+2 The Ace]

otherNightReminder: WHEN I DIE LET THEM BURN
name: The Sun
ability: When you die,a townsfolk becomes mad about being a outsider, or they might be executed

firstNightReminder: Let them mark someone as the well
otherNightReminder: Let them mark someone as the well
name: Strenght
ability: Each night, choose a player, Townsfolk who visit them are poisoned

otherNightReminder: Turn one of those fools into your master!
name: Temperance
ability: You get three bluffs, On the 3rd night, choose a player: They become an evil demon of your choice [No Demon]

name: The Fool
ability: Each Night*, choose a player and guess their role, if incorrect they learn of this, if correct they die

firstNightReminder: Pick two players, they pick eachother
otherNightReminder: Pick two players, they pick eachother
name: The Handed Man
ability: Choose two players, their abilities target each other.

name: The World
ability: Once per game*, at night you can say 'The World' out loud, night ends before the next players goes.[-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: KILL a player, if they are choosen wake them again
name: King of Strength
ability: Each night* pick a player they die, the first time each night you are chosen by a townsfolk in the night, you awake again.

name: King of Charisma
ability: You do not know you are the King of Charisma. You think you are a Townsfolk character and have that ability. The players that you pick with your townsfolk ability becomes a minion, they learn you are the demon, this can't make more than the allotted minions. *Each Night, a player dies. [ -? to +? Outsiders]

name: Queen of Intelligence
ability: *Each Night, Kills a player/s that visits it. Each night*, if no one choose you, kill a player

firstNightReminder: Poison them and mark they friends
otherNightReminder: Poison them and mark they friends
name: Queen of Wisdom
ability: Each night, pick a player, they are poisoned, players that visit them are marked and will be executed if they vote. If three players are left alive, you lose this ability.
